contend.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to compete against someone in order to gain something
contend.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Inevitably, fights break out between the members of contending groups.
Three armed groups are contending for power.
contend.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to argue or state that something is true
contend.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Some astronomers contend that the universe may be younger than previously thought.
